definitions.definition: for a short period of time but not permanently

examples.text: I'm changing my email address but for the meantime you can use the old one.

definitions.definition: in the period of time between two times or two events

examples.text: My first novel was rejected by six publishers. In the meantime I had written a play.
The next programme starts in five minutes; in the meantime, here’s some music.

wordOrigin: Middle English (as a noun): from mean(noun) + time.
